flip-token.hint: Flips the selected token (hold SHIFT to flip vertically)

flip-tile.hint: Flips the selected tile (hold SHIFT to flip vertically)

afk-toggle.hint: Toggles the AFK status of the selected tokens

show-speech-bubble.hint: Displays a speech bubble attached to your selected token to all players.

show-toggle-button.hint: Show or hide the AFK toggle button on the token HUD

allow.hint: Allow the AFK status to be toggled for player owned tokens

overlay-icon-path.hint: Path to the image to use for the AFK status indicator on tokens

show-status-in-chat.hint: Send a chat message whenever a player's AFK status changes

allow.hint: Allow speech bubbles to be displayed on tokens when the hotkey is activated.

font-size.hint: Font size of the names shown in speech bubbles in px units.

show.hint: Show or hide the flip buttons on the token HUD

animation-duration.hint: Duration of the token flip animation in seconds (0 disables animations). Use at your own risk. Only verified to work with Pathfinder 2e.
